attributes.action: Honour his pledge to hold a referendum on the EU Constitution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Further steps will be taken this June to implement further stages of the EU Constitution by Stealth.   Approval of the British public must be obtained by the Government before any further steps are taken.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/EU-treaty-NON/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
